thread.title: Research Innovations, Inc. Hires Vice President of Strategic Growth, Doug Greenlaw

author: cnbc.com
title: Research Innovations, Inc. Hires Vice President of Strategic Growth, Doug Greenlaw
text:
ALEXANDRIA, Va., Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Research Innovations, Inc., a leader in agile delivery of Command and Control, Data Analytics and Cyber Security solutions, is excited to announce the appointment of Doug Greenlaw as Vice President for Strategic Growth, working from the corporate headquarters in Alexandria, VA. He will be a member of the executive leadership team responsible for the development of corporate strategy and long term growth.
"Doug is a proven leader who has successfully led the growth and development of commercial, defense, and aerospace businesses from start-ups to market leaders by developing and implementing innovative business strategies to deliver discriminating value for customers," said Jack Harrington, RII CEO.
"I'm thrilled to work with Doug again and to have his leadership in our strategic growth. Doug is a strategic and agile thinker that knows how to apply the power of a agile organization to help customers achieve remarkable results. I am excited to work with Doug and the rest of the team to continue to scale the business creating RIIdiculously awesome solutions that make the world safer," said Rich Briggs, RII Founder and CTO.
Greenlaw has been an influential leader for over 30 years, and has been integral to the growth of industry-leading companies in the training & simulation, C4ISR, defense, and aerospace sectors. He comes to Research Innovations from Lockheed Martin where he was most recently the Chief Executive for Asia. Prior to this he was their Vice President of International Strategy, responsible for driving global growth. Greenlaw is an experienced entrepreneur and business leader who has been delivering next generation national security solutions to high-profile customers for decades.
"I am excited to not only join RII to help grow and scale this awesome company, but to also have the opportunity to work closely with Rich and Jack again. RII combines industry leading technologies in Big Data Analytics, Machine Learning, and Cyber security with an incredibly agile user-centered development model to break the big, slow status quo with transformative solutions that will fundamentally change and improve the world," Greenlaw said.
RII and its founders have a long tradition of being trusted advisors to the US Department of Defense and coalition partners. Through its work with the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), the Strategic Capabilities Office (SCO), the Department of the Army, and select international customers, RII has developed a reputation for rapidly delivering transformative technology to the decision-maker.
